title: Core Breach GNK @Riftgate
locations: Riftgate Games, 5412 S 900 E, Murray, UT 84117
Riftgate Games, 5412 S 900 E, Murray, UT 84117
details:
Salt City Grid: Core Format Game Night

Join us on Wednesday, May 14 at Riftgate Games in Murray, UT for a night of Netrunner action! We're running a Single-Sided Swiss tournament using the Core Format—that means decks built exclusively from System Gateway and Elevation.

Registration: 6:00 PM
Round 1 Start: 6:30 PM sharp
Location: Riftgate Games, 5412 S 900 E, Murray, UT 84117
Format: Single-sided swiss, 40 minutes per game.
Deck Requirements: Bring one Runner and one Corp deck. No decklists required. No bans or MWL restrictions—just the Core sets.
Need inspiration? Check out sample decks here on Null Signal Games Sample deck lists page https://nullsignal.games/players/getting-started-sample-decklists/

Prizes: We'll have goodies from the 2025 Q1 & Q2 Game Night Kits, plus some extras from past kits.

Hosted by Dan Langford and Salt City Grid – Utah Netrunner. Whether you're a seasoned runner or new to the game, come hang out and enjoy some great matches!
